remarks: If a Hilbert lattice element covers another, it equals the other joined with some atom.  This is a consequence of the relative atomicity of Hilbert space.  (Contributed by NM, 30-Nov-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
chpssat.1 $e |- A e. CH $.
chpssat.2 $e |- B e. CH $.
cvati $p |- ( A <oH B -> E. x e. HAtoms ( A vH x ) = B ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
